price: Kuma ba Mu saukar da waɗansu runduna ba daga sama* a kan (halaka) mutãnensa, daga bãyansa, kuma bã zã Mu kasance. Mãsu saukarwa ba.
arabic: ۞ وَمَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ مِن جُندٖ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ
footnotes: * Wãtau halakar da su abu ne mai sauƙi a gare Mu, ba Mu yi bukãtar saukar da wasu sõjõjin malã'iku daga samã ba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā anzalnā ʿalā qawmihi min baʿdihi min jundin mina al-samāi wamā kunnā munzilīna
